name: The Secret Ingredient (Ginger Jam): Ginger Shrimp
description: I love these shrimp. Juicy and crispy on the outside, with a thick, spicy, salty, sweet ginger-soy sauce sticking all around them.  So much flavor, and complexity—and all you did was mix ginger jam with soy sauce.
recipeIngredient: 12 15-18 count shrimp, peeled and deveined, tails attached

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly coat the shrimp with the cornstarch. Heat the oil in a wok over high heat. Sear the shrimp in batches on both sides for a total of 2 1/2 minutes.
Meanwhile, in a small saucepot, heat the ginger jam and soy sauce over medium heat for minute. Toss the shrimp in the sauce, and top with chopped scallion and fresh cilantro.
